title: Game Splat solutions aren't working
body:
Hey Guys i need some help here, ive gone through EVERY SINGLE solution to fix my gamesplat errors and im still getting the problem.

this happened when i upgraded my OS to windows 10... ive got the same GPU as before, (correct drivers too), but i keep getting bugsplats when i try to get into game.

[specs]
NVIDIA GeForce 770 , Windows 10 64bit, i7 4930k 3.40 Ghz 12 CPUs, 16 GB Ram

Now EVERY other game works on my PC, Gears 4/WoW/TF2/Overwatch/Battlefield/ Street fighter, any game you name it, im just so confused and irritated on why my games just randomly stopped working.

bare in mind i have gone through EVERY Single solution to fix my bugsplat error and its not fixed the game, any help from the community or even riot staff would be much appreciated thank you so much :)

replies.body: To ensure I'm not providing steps you haven't already done, can you give me the name of the troubleshooting guides you've already worked through?
